main event: One round, grey pea-shaped object was observed directly overhead for 1.5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to be stationary and moved out of range after fifteen minutes,The report suggests that the sighting was possibly caused by a weather balloon,The observation was made by a civilian in clear weather conditions,The report is part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book which investigated UFOs, The sighting occurred at 15:50 on 2 July 1957.
